column1: Data used in all chondrite calculations.
Source and notes are given in the first column, along with specific meteorites where known.
Sample classifications are given both as class (Column 3) and specific type (Column 2)
Meteorite classes are: E= enstatite, C=carbonaceous, O = ordinary, I = Iron, MA = martian, MO= moon, A = achondrite
